name: focsec
label: Focsec
description: Focsec help to real-time threat intelligence API, powered by proprietary Artificial Intelligence algorithms,for detecting VPNs,Proxys,Bots, and TOR requests,enabling prompt identification of suspicious logins,fraud, and abuse.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the focsec server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the focsec server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

operations.title: Get IP Details
operations.description: Retrieves a list of IP indicators from focsec.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address whose you want to retrieve from focsec.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address whose you want to retrieve from focsec.
